request.description: This request must be executed as part of the collection
This request must be executed as part of the collection
Set the `devicesQuery` variable to execute a custom query

item.name: Get list of Duo Protected Web Applications for devices

exec: throw new Error("This set of queries does not work if there are no web applications");

item.name: Wait for device to be Not Synced

exec: console.log('Device not NOT_SYNCED yet. Trying again...');
console.log('Successfully waited for device to be NOT_SYNCED');
